description: Since 2018, I have been on a great journey to be a part of the IT industry.
I love to build, test, deploy, monitor, and automate applications.
In my position as Software Engineer

Delivering exceptional expertise in troubleshooting and testing errors among automation solution (Ansible) and target servers; facilitating clients for management of 1,000+ various OS servers with server automation-monitoring web; evaluating legacy system architecture to attain desired results; integrating monitoring application built with Java (Spring Framework) in automation management tool with REST API.
Key Accomplishments, I achieved during this role:
• Automated 500+ servers by developing customer resolution management tool (REST API Server) through Node.JS utilization.
• Slashed 1% data defect rate by designing /developing scheduler to synchronize existing database (MSSQL) and target server stored database (PostgreSQL) while using Node.JS.
• Reduced 20% total automating elapsed time by maintaining close collaboration with director.
In my position as Software Developer

Implementing best practices for development and designing of various software, while ensuring compliance with standard procedures; utilizing PHP and Node.JS to design and develop additional features as well as modules in applications; delivering exceptional expertise in resolving errors and deploying containerized applications successfully by monitoring CI/CD pipeline; administering and monitoring issues at high transaction volume by 1000+ chat rooms simultaneously; synchronizing large image files of 3 TB from legacy cloud system to new cloud system for migration with network security setting.
Key Accomplishments, I attained during this role:
• Enhanced message security for 100+ client companies by collaborating with product manager to establish new message encryption configuration pages and integrate customized messages security library.
• Reduced organizational costs by migrating legacy systems to MSA environment for delivery of scalability, monitoring, and CI/CD by cooperating with other product developer teams through Kubernetes.
